title: UCF Bear Brigade to Teach Ecological Concepts to Elementary Students (University of Central Florida)
text: ( Source : University of Central Florida ) One of the black bears that is being studied by biology researcher Dan Smith . The UCF Bear Brigade , a new pilot educational program to teach ecological concepts to fourth- and fifth-grade students,
